level.text: A PSP or DDS that violates this chapter or an applicable provision of another chapter of this title is subject to:

A civil fine of two hundred fifty dollars ($250) for the first violation of a provision, which shall double for the second violation of the same provision, and triple for each subsequent violation of the same provision thereafter;

Confiscation of an MTS unit or unapproved equipment (including any fixed or mobile hardware component such as a smartphone, mobile data terminal, tablet, or attached payment card reader) used in connection with the violation:

Suspension, revocation, or non-renewal of the Office’s approval of its MTS (if a PSP) or modification, suspension, revocation, or non-renewal of its certificate of operating authority under Chapter 16 (if a DDS);
Any combination of the sanctions listed in (a)-(c) of this subsection.
